name: Youda Farmer 3: Seasons
summary: Fight the seasonal weather conditions as you harvest and process farm products to rebuild and resupply the entire village after a horribly destructive winter storm. Build new farms and shops to handle all the takeaway orders and buy tools in the pawnshop to improve your workflow. Save up to build your very own hotel and serve hungry guests your finest dishes. Eventually show off your farming abilities in different challenges during the annual country fair.
